game_description: Throw bombs at differrent zombies in cartoon-styled adventure. The more you eliminate the harder it gets! Experience the forrest filled with deadly zombies. Learn how to overcome zombies using differrent VR gaming mechanics. From day till late night... New update released! - New levels (Beat-zombie and Graveyard) - Zombie behavior improvements - Environment generation update - Other minor improvements Newest update for Zombomber is here! A lot of improvements in quality and perfomance, including: - realtime lights with soft shadows - increased resolution of textures - multisample anti-aliasing added - every explosion emits source of light and has - additional particles and effects - trees graphical presentation in train level improved - overall perfomance improved
review_1: Simple but challenging. Need more levels!
